title: Loch Henry: Truth Will Out
description: A sleepy lochside town is rocked by a string of horrific murders. Decades later, the former holiday destination has never recovered.
producer: Kate Cezar, Davis McCardle, Clara Ryce, Ted Bellingham
altHero: a dark, wood paneled room and an illuminated leather couch
alt1: David McCardle is interviewed on camera
alt2: Pia makes a funny face at the camera
alt3: cops and a reporter stand by a police stop
alt4: Janet McCardle setting up for an interview with a shelf of video tapes behind her
